text: I believe Jimmy is finalizing the new salary survey for this year but <https://superpath.co/blog/2021-content-marketing-salary-report|last year>’s should shed some light. It depends on the city and cost of living of course, but the $87k avg for in house feels about right for a manager with some experience in a bigger city, based on the convos I've had with others (give or take maybe 10K in either direction to account for different levels of experience)

attachments.fallback: Your Content Career Headquarters: The 2021 Content Marketing Salary Report — Your Content Career Headquarters
attachments.text: Thank you so much for the great response to the newest version of our Content Marketing Salary Report…..
